snippet.title: Midautumn - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Studio Team Midautumn announced that it went to Kickstarter with its Midautumn roguelike. The developers plan to raise 32 thousand dollars. At the time of writing the news, the game has $ 12,819 in the piggy bank, and there are still 31 days before the end of the campaign.

The hero of the game is a college graduate Robin Lam, who arrives in an Asian city in California to visit his grandmother. And that, in turn, is the keeper of the entrance to the world of spirits. Robin has to explore the town, communicate with the inhabitants, fight evil spirits in another world and confront those who want to turn the city into a Mecca for the rich.

The game will be released on PC on Steam. No release date yet. 

GAME PROFILE:
Developer: Team Midautumn
Publisher: Team Midautumn
Genre: Roguelike
Platform: PC
Release date: -

Subscribe: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCHxh4520qdDRQ751oNjBa7A?sub_confirmation=1

#GameTrailers #Gaming #Midautumn
